title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, September 5, 2019
description: Today is the birthday of comedian and actor Bob Newhart who said, “Don't rush into adulthood; it isn't all that much fun."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of comedian and actor Bob Newhart who said, “Don't rush into adulthood; it isn't all that much fun."
itunes:summary: Today is the birthday of comedian and actor Bob Newhart who said, “Don't rush into adulthood; it isn't all that much fun."
